name: Advanced Software Paradigms
description: Advanced programming language paradigms including functional, object-oriented, and logical. Formal principles of language design and implementation.

name: Algorithms
description: Design and analysis of algorithms. Topics include asymptotic analysis, recurrence relations, sorting, selection, dynamic programming, divide and conquer, graph algorithms, and NP-completeness.

name: Computer Architecture
description: Principles of computer organization and architecture including performance, instruction set design, pipelining, memory hierarchy, and I/O subsystems.

name: Software Engineering
description: Software development methodologies, object-oriented design, testing, verification, maintenance, management, software metrics, and implementation tools.

name: Cryptography
description: Modern cryptography including symmetric and public-key encryption, authentication, digital signatures, and cryptographic protocols.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Theory and applications of artificial intelligence including knowledge representation, inference, machine learning, and planning.

name: Data Mining
description: Concepts and techniques for data mining and knowledge discovery. Topics include classification, clustering, association rules, and sequence mining.

name: Database Management Systems
description: Design and implementation of database management systems, including data models, query languages, transaction processing, and database administration.

name: Machine Learning
description: Theoretical foundations and practical applications of machine learning including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and reinforcement learning.

name: Computer Security
description: Principles and practice of computer security including cryptography, authentication, access control, software security, and network security.
